DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , double-blind , randomize , Phase 2b trial evaluate efficacy atacicept subject systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Atacicept Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.criteria: Eligible male female subject , age 18 year old Must least moderately active SLE , define SLE Disease Activity Index2000 ( SLEDAI2K ) score great equal [ > = ] 6 screen visit At least 4 11 American college rheumatology ( ACR ) classification criterion SLE ( diagnose > = 6 month prior screen visit ) Be seropositive antinuclear antibody ( ANA ) and/or antidoublestranded deoxyribonucleic acid ( antidsDNA ) antibodies Other protocol define inclusion criterion could apply Subjects demyelinate disorder Severe central nervous system SLE Use cyclophosphamide within 3 month screen visit Urine protein : creatinine ratio ( UPCr ) > = 2 milligram per milligram ( mg/mg ) per day Other protocol define exclusion criterion could apply
